channel.title: Windows 10 Overview & Installation :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides How to Get Windows 11 from Microsoft Azure Portal via CS Support How to Install VMware Tools from VMware Windows 11 Overview from Microsoft Windows 11 Overview for System Administrators from Microsoft Microsoft Windows Version History from Wikipedia Windows 11 Help from Microsoft Windows 10 Architecture from Microsoft TechNet Windows 11 ISO Downloads from Microsoft Warning: May not work with keys from the Microsoft Imagine store!
